page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JAIMIE.
page.content: {Jaimie got up at 8.00am, washed, took {off her pyjamas and dressed in a light {green sweater and pinstripe jeans. Her {breakfast was toast and a cup of tea. After she had finished she called for her friend,Deborah.They played some games; one of which was "tiggie". { Some time later Jaimie went for {her lunch of corned beef sandwiches {and a drink of coke. The afternoon was spent playing in Deborah's tent with the Sindy dolls. { At about 5.00pm Jaimie had her tea of {chips, beans and beefburgers. After tea she watched T.V. ("Tom and Jerry" and "Dynasty") before going in the bath at 9.00pm. { Tired out Jaimie went to bed at {10.00pm and read a book for a while {before going to sleep.
